actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide that no funds be expended on the new program on smoking and health announced by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare on January 11, 1978 without specific approval by Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits, during fiscal years 1978 and 1979, the use of funds appropriated to the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to carry out a program on smoking and health described by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare on January 11, 1978. Stipulates that programs on smoking and health for the period beginning October 1, 1977 and ending January 10, 1978, shall not be affected.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no funds be expended on the new program on smoking and health announced by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare on January 11, 1978 without specific approval by Congress.
